net.hudup.core.data.ctx

Interface CTSManagerRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AlgRemote, AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener, Exportable, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable, SetupAlgListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTSManagerAbstract, CTSManagerRemoteWrapper, DefaultCTSManager

    public interface CTSManagerRemote
extends AlgRemote, AutoCloseable
    This interface represents a remote context template schema (CTS) manager.
    Version:
    12.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean remoteCommitCTSchema()
      This method commits remotely that the context template schema that CTS manager manages is valid in both memory and archive (file).
      Context remoteCreateContext(int ctxTemplateId, java.io.Serializable assignedValue)
      Creating remotely a context from the specified template ID and the specified context value.
      boolean remoteCreateContextTemplateUnit()
      Creating the unit for storing context templates.
      CTSMultiProfiles remoteCreateCTSProfiles()
      Every template owns a profile table and each value ContextValue of template corresponds to a row in this table.
      void remoteDefaultCTSchema()
      Initializing remotely the internal context template schema and committing such schema.
      ContextList remoteGetContexts(int userId, int itemId)
      Retrieving remotely a list of contexts relevant to a specified user and a specified item.
      ContextTemplateSchema remoteGetCTSchema()
      Retrieving remotely the context template schema that CTS manager manages.
      boolean remoteImportCTSchema(CTSManager ctsm)
      Importing remotely context template schema from other CTS manager.
      boolean remoteImportCTSchema(Dataset dataset)
      Importing remotely context template schema from other dataset.
      Profile remoteProfileOf(Context context)
      Getting remotely Profile of each template with regard to its value ContextValue.
      Profile remoteProfileOf(int ctxTemplateId, ContextValue ctxValue)
      Getting remotely Profile of each template with regard to its value ContextValue.
      Profiles remoteProfilesOf(int ctxTemplateId)
      Retrieving remotely all profiles associating with the same template identification (ID).
      void remoteReload()
      Reloading remotely context template schema.
      void remoteSetup(DataConfig config)
      Setting up (initializing) remotely CTS manager via specified configuration.

      • remoteCreateContextTemplateUnit

        boolean remoteCreateContextTemplateUnit()
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creating the unit for storing context templates. Unit can be a CSV file, a database table, etc.
        Returns:
        whether creating context template successfully
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteCreateContext

        Context remoteCreateContext(int ctxTemplateId,
                            java.io.Serializable assignedValue)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creating remotely a context from the specified template ID and the specified context value.
        Parameters:
        ctxTemplateId - specified context template identification (ID).
        assignedValue - specified value that is assigned to the returned context. Such value must be serializable.
        Returns:
        context created from the specified template ID and the specified value.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetContexts

        ContextList remoteGetContexts(int userId,
                              int itemId)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely a list of contexts relevant to a specified user and a specified item.
        Parameters:
        userId - specified user identification (user ID).
        itemId - specified item identification (item ID).
        Returns:
        context list represented by ContextList relevant to a specified user and a specified item.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteProfileOf

        Profile remoteProfileOf(Context context)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting remotely Profile of each template with regard to its value ContextValue. The specified context contains such template and such value. This method is the same to remoteProfileOf(int, ContextValue).
        Parameters:
        context - specified context.
        Returns:
        profile of the specified context.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteProfileOf

        Profile remoteProfileOf(int ctxTemplateId,
                        ContextValue ctxValue)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting remotely Profile of each template with regard to its value ContextValue. Every template owns a profile table and each value ContextValue of template corresponds to a row in this table. Moreover such value is id of such row.
        Parameters:
        ctxTemplateId - specified template identification (ID).
        ctxValue - specified context value.
        Returns:
        profile of each template with regard to its value.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteProfilesOf

        Profiles remoteProfilesOf(int ctxTemplateId)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely all profiles associating with the same template identification (ID).
        Parameters:
        ctxTemplateId - specified template ID.
        Returns:
        all profiles associating with the same template identification (ID).
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteCreateCTSProfiles

        CTSMultiProfiles remoteCreateCTSProfiles()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Every template owns a profile table and each value ContextValue of template corresponds to a row in this table. Each row in such template profile table is represented by Profile class. This method retrieves remotely all profiles of all templates represented by CTSMultiProfiles class.
        Returns:
        all profiles of all templates, represented by CTSMultiProfiles class.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteCommitCTSchema

        boolean remoteCommitCTSchema()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method commits remotely that the context template schema that CTS manager manages is valid in both memory and archive (file).
        Returns:
        whether the commitment is successful.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteImportCTSchema

        boolean remoteImportCTSchema(CTSManager ctsm)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Importing remotely context template schema from other CTS manager.
        Parameters:
        ctsm - other CTS manager.
        Returns:
        whether import successfully.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteImportCTSchema

        boolean remoteImportCTSchema(Dataset dataset)

        Returns:
        whether import successfully
